short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable video controls on Facebook reels and stories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension that enables controls to Facebook Reels and Stories, allowing users to customize their video playback experience.

Video controls include:
- Play/pause button
- Volume control
- Playback speed control
- Fullscreen mode

Attribution:
The extension icon is created by Freepik - Flaticon:
https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/play-button
